answers.answer: Its When You Have High Blood Pressure

Its more common near the end of pregnancy. The symptoms are high bp, major swelling, and protein in your urine. They say if you have 2/3 symptoms then you have it. The headaches and blurred vision can be caused by the high bp. Im 35 weeks and have it. My doc says we will probably have to induce due to the high bp. I may also have to be on bed rest.

question: can someone explain what it is.. I was at my doc apt and she sent me to l&d to be monitored and have to do blood work cause she said my headaches and blurred vision could be a sign of preeclampsia ...
title: preeclampsia ?
